heading: 10.1 Sourcing data using OpenStreetMaps
text: OpenStreetMap best readily available data source analysis needs , unlike commercial maps like Google Maps Bing Maps, data OSM can downloaded taken favourite GIS tool. can even add details neighbourhood document surroundings better, adding information sidewalks, CCTV cameras streetlights (safeyelli2022?).OSM, map divided three main components: nodes, edges, relationships. Nodes points map, buildings points interest, edges lines connect , like roads, rivers, rail networks. Relationships describe nodes edges relate , Bangalore city within Karnataka.One biggest strengths OSM thorough documentation. Users can explore select features map using select query button, brings list features area. item list tagged annotated, providing detailed information type, category, name, even added verified information.Geofabrik one accessible sources downloadable OSM data, providing pre-processed extracts OSM data various regions countries around world. data provided Geofabrik includes OSM features, including roadways, water features, buildings, among others.addition Geofabrik, can create custom queries download specific OSM data based needs. can done using tools like Overpass Turbo, allows build run queries extract particular features OSM data.

heading: 10.1.1 Using Overpass Turbo
text: delve deeper world OSM, ’ll inevitably want extract data . can use large dataset like Geofabrik offers, might want get need nothing . ’s Overpass Turbo comes handy. Overpass Turbo user-friendly interface running queries OSM database using Overpass API.First, identify ’re looking OSM’s interface start Overpass Turbo. trying locate toilets, metro stations, shops, something else? ’ve identified features ’re interested , examine tags understand OSM categorizes .example, let’s say want find toilets Bangalore. quick search Google tells OSM categorizes toilets amenity. build query Overpass Turbo, open Turbo query wizard type query:Hit run button, ’ll get map toilets Bangalore! , find completed proposed metro stations city well (figure 10.1).Figure 10.1:  Locations metro stations Bangalore OSM. one detailed tags help search .stop ? Overpass Turbo lets play sorts queries extract needed data. examples get started:Table 10.1 shows sample queries get started.’ve settled query want use, can export data GeoJSON file clicking “Export” button top bar Overpass Turbo. , can visualize data favourite GIS software share others analysis.
code:
amenity=toilets in Bangalore    operator:BMRCL and subway=yes in Bangalore    // Metro lines and stations
amenity=restaurant in Bangalore              // Restaurants
highway=footway and bridge=yes in Bangalore  // Footbridges
natural=water in Bangalore                   // Lakes

heading: 14.2 Google Street View for audits
text:
Street audits crucial tool assessing built environment’s impact public health. However, conducting physical street audits can take time effort. Recent advancements made virtual street audits using Google Street View cost-effective efficient alternative. situations physical visits site may difficult impossible, logistical constraints, virtual street audits can supplement analysis provide comprehensive understanding environment. heading: 19 Setting up OpenRouteService
text: OpenRouteService (ORS) powerful plugin enables various types analysis, including isochrones routing. following instructions, can set ORS QGIS. Let’s get !

heading: Step 1: Login and Token Generation
text: haven’t done already, create account openrouteservice.org login. ’re logged , select Standard token type enter name token.Token Generation

heading: Step 2: Downloading the ORS Plugin
text: Go “Plugins” menu.Select “Manage Install Plugins” dropdown list.Plugins dialog box, search “ORS Tools” using search bar right-hand side.find “ORS Tools”, select click “Install Plugin” button.QGIS download install plugin . ’s finished, close Plugin dialog box.now see new toolbar called “ORS Tools” QGIS interface.

heading: Step 3: Authenticating the Plugin
text: Click “Settings” button ORS Tools toolbar.ORS Tools Settings dialog box, click “Authentication” tab.Enter API key “API Key” field add https://api.openrouteservice.org Base URL.Authenticating Plugin
